snippet: Worldline, an Atos subsidiary that provides electronic payment products, said it would price its shares at 16.40 euros to 20 euros, valuing the unit at up to €2.4 billion, or $3.2 billion.
abstract: Worldline, an Atos subsidiary that provides electronic payment products, said it would price its shares at 16.40 euros to 20 euros, valuing the unit at up to €2.4 billion, or $3.2 billion.

headline.main: Atos of France to Spin Off Its Payments Unit in I.P.O.
